DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective show positive pressure extubation improve oxygenation immediately extubation compare extubation via `` aspiration '' evaluate compare onset time desaturation spontaneous ventilation awaken follow general anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Spontaneous Ventilation Time Air Without Desaturation After Positive Pressure Extubation Versus Aspiration Extubation When Awakening From General Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: The patient must give his/her inform sign consent The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The patient available 1 hour follow ASA 1 3 The patient schedule orthopedic surgery ( limb ) general anesthesia The patient participate another study The patient exclusion period determine previous study The patient judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The patient refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform patient The patient pregnant The patient breastfeed Chronic respiratory insufficiency Cardiopathy Obstructive sleep apnea Two predictive criterion difficult mask ventilation ( age > 55 year , toothless , beard , snorer , BMI > 26 ) No predictive criterion difficult intubation ( SPIDS < = 10 )
